content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Ryanah. I'm happy to discuss the rental price with you. What are you looking to pay monthly for a 25 square meter apartment in this area?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I'm looking for the lowest possible price. Can you give me an offer?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I understand that you're looking for the best deal possible, and I'm willing to work with you to find a fair rental price. Based on current market rates in the area, I'm willing to offer you a rental price of 500 Euros per month for the 25 square meter apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 500 Euros per month.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Great! I'm glad we could come to an agreement. The rental price of 500 Euros per month for a 25 square meter apartment is fair and reasonable, and I'm confident that it will meet your needs. If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine
